thread.title: Close to the tube & tower bridge
thread.title_full: Close to the tube & tower bridge - Review of Novotel London Tower Bridge, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: brickbaby
title: Close to the tube & tower bridge
text:
Great hotel which we got through membership of Accor (points based). Very close to the Tube and Tower Bridge. Plenty of restaurants in the area and short walk to St Katherine's Dock for eating and drinking which isn't touristy due to being hidden away and I think a it's a little gem.
Amazing bar next door at the Hilton Double Trees sky bar.
Breakfast was everything and more than you expect.
Will return for sure. I have children with me and it felt safe and easy to get around.
